Posts.Content: thank you for your post, cassie! so much strength and support in your words. i'm 3 days away from 2nd cycle of chemo. will have 8 in total and then rads... at 34 with a 6 yr old daughter 6 months after a major break up this has been a whirlwind. however i am more calm and optimistic as ever. we just HAVE to pull thru! dont give up. can't :) bless everyone. we can beat that effing cancer!
Posts.Title: Worrying scan results
